creator: MKusz@officedepot.com
text:
I have several Categories with FileAppenders that write to the same Log File. 
Each time a Category writes to the log File, it overwrites whatever was 
previously in the log File. This happens everytime a different Category trys to 
access the log File. This does not happen with the Root log File.

creator: bugzilla@apache.org
text: Please provide more detail about your configuration.

Is the appender variable created afresh or are you always using the same 
variable? If it's the same variable then appender.setFile will first close and 
reopen any existing file. Hope this helps, Ceki
creator: bugzilla@apache.org
